name: HeroSplitKpi
description: Split-layout hero with media image/video and three KPI metric boxes positioned around it.

description.example: Ship globally within 3 days post-production with smart fulfillment

kpis.note: Array of exactly 3 KPI items. Each item has 'value' (the metric) and 'label' (description)

structure.label: string - Description of the metric (e.g., 'Order Accuracy')

kpis.example: [{ value: '4-10 Days', label: 'Worldwide Delivery' }, { value: '99.8%', label: 'Order Accuracy' }, { value: '10x', label: 'Faster Lead Times' }]

imageSrc.note: Image displayed in scaled card wrapper

videoSrc.note: Video takes precedence over image if both provided

imageAlt.note: Empty string marks image as decorative (aria-hidden)

propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.kpis: [KpiItem, KpiItem, KpiItem] - Array of exactly 3 KPI items with value and label
propsSchema.enableKpiAnimation: boolean - Enable/disable mouse-following animation on KPI boxes
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>
propsSchema.avatars?: Avatar[] - Array of avatar objects with src and alt properties
propsSchema.avatarText?: string - Text displayed next to the avatar group

usageExample: <HeroSplitKpi title="The Future of Supply Chain" description="Ship globally within 3 days with smart fulfillment" background={{ variant: "radial-gradient" }} enableKpiAnimation={true} kpis={[{ value: '4-10 Days', label: 'Worldwide Delivery' }, { value: '99.8%', label: 'Order Accuracy' }, { value: '10x', label: 'Faster Lead Times' }]} imageSrc="/hero-image.jpg" imageAlt="Supply chain" buttons={[{ text: 'Get Started', href: 'https://example.com' }]} />
